name: Retraced Path
flavor_text: An early prototype that brought the potential for future Trace Rifles into sharper focus.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description: A well-rounded grip, reliable and sturdy.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description:
Large heavy battery.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Ionized Battery

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description:
Distance optimizations.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Projection Fuse

perks.description:
Lightweight, agile battery.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: Light Battery

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple small improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Tactical Battery

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion

perks.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves.
perks.name: Shoot to Loot

perks.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Subsistence

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves. Increases range.
perks.name: Shoot to Loot

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves, with Kinetic weapons overflowing. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for an improved duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion for a short duration.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion Enhanced

perks.description: Each rapid final blow with this weapon progressively increases reload speed substantially for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves with an increased amount of ammo.
perks.name: Subsistence

perks.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage. While this buff is active, grenade or melee kills of the same damage type greatly increase its damage and duration.
perks.name: Golden Tricorn

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for an improved duration.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for an improved duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for an improved duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon for an improved duration until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant bonus damage for an improved duration. While this buff is active, grenade or melee final blows of the same damage type greatly increase its damage for an improved duration.
perks.name: Golden Tricorn Enhanced
